publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4297 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees that, for the purposes of Members’ Business on Thursday 11 June 2009, "at the end of First Minister’s Question Time and at the end of the meeting following Decision Time" be substituted for "at the end of the meeting following Decision Time" in Rule 5.6.1(c) of Standing Orders.
